TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract ShaderEffect extends System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect
Public MustInherit Class ShaderEffect Inherits Effect
public ref class ShaderEffect abstract : System::Windows::Media::Effects::Effect

summary.span: 通过使用 提供自定义位图效果。

span.span: Provides a custom bitmap effect by using a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从类派生以实现基于单个像素着色器的自定义效果。Derive from the class to implement a custom effect based on a single pixel shader. 以下步骤演示如何创建自定义效果。The following steps show how to create a custom effect. 1. 从预编译的高级着色语言 (HLSL) 字节码加载。Load a from precompiled High Level Shading Language (HLSL) bytecode. 2. 定义表示效果的参数和基于的图面输入的依赖项属性。Define dependency properties that represent the parameters of the effect and the -based surface inputs. 使用其中一个重载将这些输入与 HLSL 字节码中引用的寄存器号关联。Use one of the overloads to associate these inputs with register numbers that are referenced in the HLSL bytecode. 采样器数限制为4。The number of samplers is limited to 4. 使用 PS 3.0 着色器时, 以下限制适用。The following restrictions apply when using a PS 3.0 shader. - 分配 PS 3.0 着色器后, 取样器数将增加到8。When a PS 3.0 shader is assigned, the number of samplers increases to 8. 将 PS 3.0 着色器分配到其他着色器之前, 以允许注册8个取样器。Assign the PS 3.0 shader before other shaders to enable registering 8 samplers. - 使用完整的着色器常量寄存器限制 (224)。The full shader constant register limit of 224 for floats is used. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ps_3_0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=166292)。For more information, see [ps_3_0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=166292). - 仅 PS 3.0 着色器支持以下数据类型。The following data types are supported in PS 3.0 shaders only. 如果在较低的着色器版本中使用了异常, 则会引发异常。An exception is thrown if these are used in lower shader versions. - `int`和类型可转换为`int`: `uint` `byte` `sbyte` 、、、`long`、 `ulong` 、、、`ushort` `short``char``int` and types convertible to `int`: `uint`, `byte`, `sbyte`, `long`, `ulong`, `short`, `ushort`, `char` - `bool` - 如果在不支持 PS 3.0 硬件的计算机上加载有效 PS 3.0 着色器, 则将忽略着色器。If a valid PS 3.0 shader is loaded on a computer that does not have hardware support for PS 3.0, the shader is ignored. 如果着色器无效, 则不会引发异常。If the shader is invalid, no exception is thrown. - 如果计算机有多个视频卡, 则该行为由功能最少的视频卡定义。If a computer has more than one video card, the behavior is defined by the least capable video card. 例如, 如果计算机有两个视频卡, 其中一个卡支持 PS 3.0, 其中一个不支持 PS, 则行为与计算机不支持 PS 3.0 时相同。For example, if the computer has two video cards, one of which supports PS 3.0 and one of which does not, the behavior is the same as if the computer does not support PS 3.0. - 如果计算机支持在硬件中呈现 PS 3.0, 但分配了无效的 ps 3.0 着色器, 则会引发事件。If a computer supports rendering PS 3.0 in hardware, but an invalid PS 3.0 shader is assigned, the event is raised. 无效 PS 3.0 着色器的一个示例是用`ps_3_sw`标志编译的着色器。An example of an invalid PS 3.0 shader is one compiled with the `ps_3_sw` flag. 类只接受用传递到 fxc.exe 的`ps_3_0`标记编译的 PS 3.0 着色器。 The class accepts only PS 3.0 shaders that are compiled with the `ps_3_0` flag passed to fxc.exe. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[效果-编译器工具](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=166293)。For more information, see [Effect-Compiler Tool](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=166293). > [!NOTE] > 在软件中呈现时, PS 2.0 着色器将运行。PS 2.0 shaders run when rendering in software. 但是, 即使系统的硬件支持 PS 3.0, PS 3.0 着色器也不会在软件呈现期间运行。However, even if PS 3.0 is supported by the system's hardware, PS 3.0 shaders do not run during software rendering. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从类派生。The following code example shows how to derive from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect/CS/ThresholdEffect.cs#1)] 下面的代码示例演示与前面的类相对应的着色器。The following code example shows a shader that corresponds to the previous class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect/CS/Threshold.fx#10)] 下面的 XAML 演示如何使用自定义着色器效果。The following XAML shows how to use the custom shader effect. [!code-xaml[System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect#1000](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect/CS/Window1.xaml#1000)]

summary.span: 在复制此对象的依赖项属性时，此方法复制资源引用和数据绑定（可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying this object's dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (which may no longer resolve), but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用于生成冻结对象的可修改副本。 The method can be used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects. 为方便起见, 此方法隐藏了继承方法以提供强类型实现。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited method to provide a strongly typed implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结对象 (或任何对象) 的可修改副本。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见, 此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property int DdxUvDdyUvRegisterIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.DdxUvDdyUvRegisterIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示要用于纹理坐标对屏幕空间的偏导数的着色器寄存器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the shader register to use for the partial derivatives of the texture coordinates with respect to screen space.

value.span: 包含偏导数的寄存器的索引。

span.span: The index of the register that contains the partial derivatives.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可以指定包含纹理坐标相对于屏幕空间的偏导数的着色器寄存器。Use the property to specify the shader register that contains the partial derivatives of the texture coordinates with respect to screen space. 例如, 如果设置为 4, 则使用着色器注册 c4。For example, if is set to 4, the shader register c4 is used. Register c4 包含四个 float 字段。Register c4 contains four float fields. 以下高级着色语言 (HLSL) 代码显示了如何使用此寄存器。The following High Level Shading Language (HLSL) code shows how this register is used. `nextPixelUV`该值表示右侧的下一个像素。The `nextPixelUV` value represents the next pixel to the right. ``` float4 ddxUvDdyUv : register(c4); SamplerState sampler : register(S0); ... float2 nextPixelUV; nextPixelUV.u = ddxUvDdyUv.x + u; nextPixelUV.v = ddxUvDdyUv.y + v; tex2D(sampler, nextPixelUV); ``` 下表显示如何填充为指定的 。The following table shows how the register specified for is filled. |Register 常量Register Constant|导数值Derivative Value| |-----------------------|----------------------| |x 组件x component|ddx (u)ddx(u)| |y 组件y component|ddx(v)ddx(v)| |z 组件z component|ddy (u)ddy(u)| |w 组件w component|ddy (v)ddy(v)| 纹理坐标表示为`(u, v)`。Texture coordinates are denoted as `(u, v)`. `ddx(u)`是纹理坐标组件`u`相对于屏幕空间 x 坐标的常量部分导数。`ddx(u)` is the constant partial derivative of the texture coordinate component `u` with respect to the screen-space x-coordinate. `ddy(u)`是纹理坐标`u`相对于屏幕空间 y 坐标的部分导数。`ddy(u)` is the partial derivative of the texture coordinate `u` with respect to the screen-space y-coordinate. 同样, `ddx(v)`和`ddy(v)`是纹理坐标组件`v`的相应屏幕空间派生。Similarly, `ddx(v)` and `ddy(v)` are the corresponding screen-space derivatives for the texture coordinate component `v`. > [!NOTE] > HLSL 具有用于计算这些值的 ddx 和 ddy 说明, 但这些说明在所有 PixelShader 2.0 硬件上都不可用。HLSL has the ddx and ddy instructions to calculate these values, but these instructions are not available on all PixelShader 2.0 hardware. 您可以按以下方式考虑这些常量。You may think of these constants in the following way. 如果在屏幕空间 (x 方向) 上向右第1个`ddx(u)`像素的步骤, 则为纹理空间中的`u`更改量, `v`并且`ddx(v)`为纹理空间中的变化量。If you step 1 pixel to the right in screen space (in the x direction), then `ddx(u)` is the amount that `u` changes in texture space, and `ddx(v)` is the amount that `v` changes in texture space. 如果效果在呈现时为轴对齐, 则`ddx(v)`为0。If the effect is axis-aligned when it is rendered, then `ddx(v)` is 0. 如果效果在呈现时旋转, `ddx(v)`则为非零值。If the effect is rotated when it is rendered, then `ddx(v)` is non-zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在为着色器常数注册依赖属性时, 请使用方法。Use the method when you register a dependency property for a shader constant. 方法构造一个委托, 在调用它时, 将在依赖项属性与指定的`floatRegisterIndex`着色器常数寄存器之间创建关联。 The method constructs a delegate that, when invoked, creates an association between the dependency property and the shader constant register specified by `floatRegisterIndex`.
